observation: Roberts Mart | Innovative flexible packaging solutions  Solutions Reliable, innovative and cost-effective packaging solutions. View all Pouches & Bags Heat Seal Films Shrink Films Cold Seal Films Paper SpectRM® Markets Our solutions protect a vast array of products across multiple markets. Learn more about just some of markets we work with. Snacks & Confectionery Beverages Dried Foods & Cereal Wet Wipes & Hygiene Frozen Foods Home Textiles Pet Care Health Converters & Label Manufacturers Innovation Our Innovations Sustainability Homepage About About Roberts Mart Meet the Team Our History Hot Topics Careers Contact Don't follow the pack Innovative packaging since 1852 Leading Edge Integrated Technology All key production processes managed in-house Our Multi-award winning print technology Sustainable flexible packaging Product innovation for a circular economy What we do We work for many of the UK’s largest food & drink manufacturers, offering them fresh thinking in the form of innovative, effective & environmentally aware packaging solutions, making us the UK’s leading flexible packaging manufacturer – bar none. Our solutions Who we do it for Leading UK and European brands We work closely with leading UK & European brands with whom we develop tailor-made, flexible packaging solutions to present a wide range of products from duvets to crisps & toilet rolls to spring water. At Roberts Mart, there is no such thing as ‘standard’ packaging. Don’t take our word for it… Our innovative packaging solutions are born out of highly technical film experts and have achieved recognition from not just our customers but industry experts who’ve helped us grown an impressive trophy cabinet. In fact, we’ve just had to buy a second one, such has been our success. Our markets View our latest video Bags & Pouches Paper Packaging Helping brands stand out and sell more First impressions count. That's why our technical teams work so closely with both customer designers & brand teams to ensure that the product packaging that pops on the shelf is theirs. Our latest innovations In 2024 we are investing over £11m in state-of-the-art technology and our facilities to give our customers even more advanced packaging solutions and greater value than ever. Ben Roberts Marketing Director Roberts Mart Family Values Founded in 1852 and now run by the sixth generation of the Roberts family, Roberts Mart is built on our enduring family values of loyalty, fairness, hard work and forward thinking. Of course, our extended ‘family’ are 220 highly skilled individuals who we’re proud to work with every day. The site appears to represent a legitimate business with a history, provides detailed information about its products and services, and mentions investment into technology. There is no mention of unusually low prices or free claims that would be suspicious, and the company information appears to be existent and detailed. To further assess the legitimacy of the contact details and the privacy policy, I should extract hyperlinks to see if they have appropriate business-related URLs and if the privacy policy is properly linked and defined.

The extracted hyperlinks include a link to a live stream of their new production facility, which suggests a level of transparency not common in fraudulent sites. However, I still need to check the appropriateness of the contact details and the privacy policy.

thought: The WHOIS data indicates that the domain was registered on December 18, 1998, and has a long history, which is usually a positive sign and not characteristic of a fraudulent site. The domain is registered until December 18, 2024, and was last updated on December 8, 2022, which shows it is being actively maintained. There are no red flags here such as a very recent registration date or a short registration period, which are often seen with fraudulent sites. Given the lack of any red flags from the WHOIS data, and the professional presentation of the website with detailed company information and a history of awards and investments, it is reasonable to conclude that the website does not fit the profile of a fraudulent site. I now know the final answer. The URL https://www.roberts-mart.co.uk/ does not appear to be a fraudulent site.

observation.reason: The website has a professional appearance detailed company history ongoing investments and transparency through a live stream link. The domain has a long-standing registration history and is actively maintained with no evidence of unusually low prices ambiguous privacy policies or inappropriate contact details.
